casebody.data:
Monday, June 12, 1995

MOTION DOCKET

95-976. State v. Yeagley. Wayne County, No. 2895.

This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and a claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, denied, effective June 9, 1995.

Wright, J., dissents.
